Name: Phase0
Description: Basic rack container and workshop container with minimal power and data infrastructure. Initial setup phase.

Name: Phase1
Description: Workshop container operational with basic tools. Rack container populated with initial IT equipment and power systems.

Name: Phase2
Description: Tiny-home container added for living quarters. Basic orchard layout planned and initial trees planted.

Name: Phase3
Description: Greenhouse structure complete. Water management with swales and retention ponds operational. Orchard expanded.

Name: Phase4
Description: Extended perimeter fencing. LRAD and strobe deterrence systems installed. Security camera network deployed.

Name: Phase5
Description: Aircela climate control operational. Extended infrastructure including backup systems. Full site build-out complete.
